name: Advance Pricing Table
author: wpbean

sections.description:
Advance Pricing Table by http://wpbean.com

Advance pricing table is a highly customizable , most advance , very easy and light weight WordPress Pricing Table Plugin.
Very easy to use and fully mobile device responsive. Supported with all kind of WordPress Themes.

  • Upgrade to the Pro Version Now!»
  • View a live demo »
  • Documentation »
  • Support »

Plugin Features

  • Responsive Pricing Table.
  • Unlimited Column for pricing plan.
  • Customizable color scheme.
  • 3 different theme for differet style pricing table.
  • Work with all standard WordPress Theme.
  • Very light weight.
  • Very easy to use.
  • Developer friendly & easy to customize.

Pro features:

  • Advance drag & drop shortcode builder in editor.
  • Visual Composer Support with custom pricing table element.
  • Priority Support.
  • Free Installation ( If needed ).
  • Life time free update.
  • And many more.

Video Documentation:
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin.

  • Then follow the shortcode instruction form plugin documentation.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin.

  • Then follow the shortcode instruction form plugin documentation.

Is it possible to make multiple pricing table at a time?

Yes you can make unlimited pricing plan by using same shortcode again.

Can I link to pricing table button to an external link?

Yes you can. It has a shortcode attribute for doing that.

How many features I can add in pricing plan?

It’s unlimited. Just write comma separated features in shortcode attribute.

short_description: This plugin will add a responsive Pricing Table in your wordpress site.
